purpose: The email announces an extended deadline for paper submissions to the Joint Ontologies Workshops (JOWO), now due on June 14th, 2025. It encourages ontology-engineering enthusiasts to submit their work, emphasizing that even small ideas can have significant impacts. The email highlights the importance of sharing ideas within the community and provides a list of workshops where submissions can be made. Additionally, it includes important dates related to the workshops and registration for the associated conference.

infos:
Subject: [CfP] Extended deadline for JOWO paper submissions
From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Reply-To:SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Date:Thu, 5 Jun 2025 13:58:28 -0000
Content-Type:text/plain

We draw your immediate attention to this call: The submission deadline of all JOWO workshops has been extended to June 14th, 2025, which means you still have roughly two weeks to finish that report, idea, result, vision, or model that you have been working on.
Take this chance, we welcome your work within the communities of Joint Ontologies Workshops (JOWO).'
You may find landing grounds for your work in one of the following JOWO workshops:
Cognition and OntologiesS (CAOS9)
14th International Workshop on Formal Ontologies Meet Industry (FOMI)
Fifth International Workshop on Semantic Web and Ontology Design for Cultural Heritage (SWODCH 2025)
The Ninth Image Schema Day (ISD9)
Integrated Food Ontology Workshop (IFOW 2025)
9th Workshop on Foundational Ontology (FOUST IX)
2nd Playing with Meanings workshop (PwM2)
Knowledge Management and process mining for Law (KM4LAW)
The 2nd International Workshop on Modeling for Cybersecurity (Shields 2)
Second Annual Workshop on Convergence of Large-Language Models and Ontologies (ONTOLLM 2025)
Explicit and Implicit Knowledge Extraction (EIKE)
Ontologies for Services and Social-good (OSS)
Workshop on Promoting Healthy Aging through the Semantic Enrichment of Social Science (PHASES 2025)
Perspectival Ontology Workshop on Entities that can be Realized (POWERs)
Planning and Ontology Workshop (PLATO)
JOWO is co-hosted with the 15th International Conference on Formal Ontology in Information Systems (FOIS), held at Catania from September 8-12, 2025.
JOWO Workshops
* Workshop paper submission deadline: 25 May 2025 1 June 14 June 2025*
* Workshop paper author notification: 14 July 2025
* Camera-ready submission: 1 September 2025
https://www.dmi.unict.it/fois2025/?page_id=499
* Early bird registration: July 25th, 2025
* On site registration: August 31st, 2025
For more information, please visit the registration page<https://www.dmi.unict.it/fois2025/?page_id=728>.
We, the organization of FOIS and JOWO, look forward to receiving your submissions.
http://sigsoft.org/resources/seworld.html provides more
